strings.Value: "Just Lander? No last name? No title?"
"Please, tell me again what you're doing here?"
"Tell me once more what you want from me."
{n}A handsome, well-dressed young man of about seventeen years old looks at you with a polite smile.{/n}
"So, you're the famous slayer of the Stag Lord's gang, soon to be a baron{mf||ess}? Pleased to make your acquaintance. My name is... Lander."
"Well, let's just say I'm here... incognito. Under my circumstances, it's wise to keep one's lineage to oneself."

"Oh, no, I'm not from here. I'm just visiting, you could say. I wanted to see for myself the heroes who managed to conquer the frontier lands, and the Lord Mayor was kind enough to invite me to this wonderful party."

"Truth be told, that's precisely what I wanted to speak with you about. You see, I am an heir to one of {g|Brevoy}Brevoy's{/g} Noble Houses. I won't say which, but believe me, a newly appointed baron{mf||ess} with no connections would do well to have a friend like me."
"Wait, we've only just met! This is the whole point of parties such as this â€” making connections that could eventually grow into alliances!"
